name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York

task.description: Be patient, this task may take several minutes.
task.name: wineexec

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Vampire The Masquerade - Coteries of New York/VtM Coteries of New York.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select Windows GOG setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Vampire The Masquerade - Coteries of New York/VtM Coteries
    of New York.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating WINE prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    description: Be patient, this task may take several minutes.
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
